title: Identity Thief
description: When Daphne and Craig move into a new apartment, they have every reason to believe that they have left their troubled past behind them. Everything seems perfect, but after the discovery of a mysterious hatch in his closet, Craig begins to realize that something disturbingly inhuman is seeking a way into his home, desperate to enter his life in the most intimate and unsettling way possible.'Identity Thief' is a suspenseful graphic novel published by Fanboy Comics. It is written by Bryant Dillon and features phenomenal imagery from the talented hands of artist Meaghan O'Keefe.
author: Bryant Dillon
